snippet.title: The Mystic Land of Tales // FREE BL (Yaoi) Game
snippet.description:
"The Mystic Land of Tales" is a BL (yaoi) smartphone game by AbracadabraGames.
It was released on April 25th on App Store and Google Play.

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.otomedou.fwe.otoginokuniEn
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/the-mystic-land-of-tales/id1373180835?mt=8&ign-mpt=uo%3D4

☆ Story ☆
On their way home, high school students Allis and Suzuto are suddenly dragged to another world.
That world is the "Mystic Land of Tales", dominated by the capricious Kamisama.

To participate in a strange game sponsored by Kamisama himself,
who will fulfill any of the winner's wishes,
Allis pairs up with an unfriendly hatter from Wonderland
and Suzuto joins a tsundere boy from Neverland.

What will happen in each country?
What wishes will the winners want to fulfill...?

Enjoy this amazing story with a fixed coupling setting!
